item.title: [4 Newbs] Making items dissapear when dropped
item.dc:creator: @v0x v0x
item.description:
@v0x wrote:

This is easy as shit, and im pretty sure its a snippet but whatever lol.

This is usefull for preventing drop trades, any dupes that have to do with drops.
(This doesn’t effect pks, as in if your opponent dies, there dropped items will not vanish.

In your client.java search for this

public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) {

and under it add this

if(droppedItem <= 16000){ deleteItem(droppedItem, 2147000000); return; }

if(droppedItem <= 16000){

Saying that if the item id is less than 16000 then do blah blah blah.

deleteItem(droppedItem, 2147000000);

this is saying to delete whatever “droppedItem” was once dropped; the ammount 2147000000 is saying to delete anything that is lower or equal to that amount since that’s the max amount of anything you can have.

return; }

ends the code.

If you could possibly manage to mess this up, post questions. Im not expecting any questions lol.

Read full topic
item.source: [4 Newbs] Making items dissapear when dropped
